table.name: vtiger_signedrecord
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_signedrecord` ( `signedrecordid` int(19) NOT NULL, `signedrecordno` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `signature` text, `signature_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '// name of signature', `signature_date` date DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '// date of signature', `filename` text COMMENT '// file(signed or rejected document) to download', `signedrecord_status` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '// update this field with "accept & sign" or "decline" value(based on mapping)', `related_to` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`signedrecordid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_signedrecord
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_signedrecord` ADD COLUMN `signedrecord_type` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '// *If user signs document - set type to "Signed"; *If user OPENS document - set type to "Opened"';
